body.text:
Try doing these steps to remove and add the profile.
Step 1: Close Outlook
Step 2: Click on start in your system and type mail(Microsoft Outlook 2016) and select.
Step 3: Click Profile and Remove the profile and open outlook.
Step 4: Restart Outlook
Step 5: Add the related accounts again.
body.id: Try doing these steps to remove and add the profile. Step 1: Close Outlook Step 2: Click on start in your system and type mail(Microsoft Outlook 2016) and select. Step 3: Click Profile and Remove the profile and open outlook. Step 4: Restart Outlook Step 5: Add the related accounts again.
